prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing congratulations greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

üé® CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clich√© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Hawaii ocean with fish and turtles 
New York mom and dad and heritage
San Francisco tech world

Stars
Navigating across the world

Eyes closed
Dreaming
Getting Visions"
Style: ‚ú® Minimalist
Tone: ‚ù§Ô∏è Heartfelt - sincere and emotional
To: Mele
From: Little mel
Message: "Mele

Sing your true song

Travel with your heart

Trust your heart "



CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front ‚Üí interior ‚Üí back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the sincere and emotional tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way








Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "congratulations" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. Create charming cartoon-style or stylized illustrated figures if people are needed for the theme. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in minimalist style with clean lines, simple shapes, plenty of white space, sophisticated typography, and elegant simplicity

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a congratulations card with sincere and emotional tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in minimalist style with clean lines, simple shapes, plenty of white space, sophisticated typography, and elegant simplicity

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Mele

Sing your true song

Travel with your heart

Trust your heart " positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clich√© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in minimalist style with clean lines, simple shapes, plenty of white space, sophisticated typography, and elegant simplicity

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in minimalist style with clean lines, simple shapes, plenty of white space, sophisticated typography, and elegant simplicity

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
Here are the detailed prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing congratulations greeting card, based on your original context and the provided image.

```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a greeting card, minimalist flat 2D artwork, full-bleed dark navy blue background. A delicate, thin golden line art depicts a profile silhouette of a woman with her eyes closed, appearing to be dreaming or in deep thought. Emanating from her head, a single golden line curves upwards and transforms into the iconic outline of a suspension bridge, symbolizing connection and a journey. Below the silhouette, the word \"congratulations\" is written in elegant, flowing golden cursive script, positioned centrally and safely away from the edges. At the bottom of the card, three thin, wavy golden lines suggest ocean waves, and beneath them, a small, silhouetted sea turtle is visible, referencing Hawaiian heritage and ocean themes. The overall mood is serene, heartfelt, and sophisticated, with clean lines and ample negative space.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a greeting card, minimalist flat 2D artwork, full-bleed dark navy blue background, continuing the elegant theme. A single, thin golden line art depicts the silhouette of a stylized, simplified sea turtle swimming gently in the ocean. This element subtly echoes the turtle from the front cover, providing a sense of closure and connection to the theme of travel and heritage. The design is extremely simple, focusing on the turtle and leaving the majority of the space open. The bottom-right corner (approximately 1 inch square) is completely clear for a QR code. The design is centered and slightly towards the left, maintaining a serene and peaceful atmosphere, with clean lines and a limited color palette consistent with the front cover.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior of a greeting card, minimalist flat 2D artwork, full-bleed dark navy blue background. This section visually represents navigating across the world and embracing dreams. A single, flowing golden line art depicts a stylized, minimalist star constellation or a celestial path, subtly suggesting navigation and journey. Intertwined with this celestial element are faint, abstract representations of flowing water or currents, hinting at the ocean and travel. The composition is clean and open, with a focus on the upward movement and progression of the golden lines. There are no people or characters depicted. The mood is contemplative and hopeful, using the same sophisticated color palette and line art style as the front cover, creating a sense of a journey unfolding.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior of a greeting card, minimalist flat 2D artwork, full-bleed dark navy blue background. This section visually culminates the narrative with a heartfelt message. The handwritten message, \"Mele\n\nSing your true song\n\nTravel with your heart\n\nTrust your heart\", is rendered in a beautiful, clear, and flowing golden cursive script, positioned centrally and safely away from the edges. The handwriting has a natural, warm, and personal feel, with slight variations in line weight to suggest a pen. The message is elegantly framed by subtle, abstract golden line art that evokes flowing water, gentle waves, or perhaps the unfurling of dreams. These decorative elements are sophisticated and unique, avoiding clich√©s and harmonizing with the overall minimalist aesthetic. The mood is deeply sincere, emotional, and encouraging, creating the emotional peak of the card experience."
}
```
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a congratulations card with a minimalist, flat 2D art style. The background is a deep, dark navy blue, evoking a night sky or deep ocean. Scattered across the upper portion of the card are several small, delicate golden dots, representing stars. Flowing across the center of the card is a stylized, abstract representation of a wave rendered in thin, elegant golden lines. The wave crests in the upper right quadrant, and within its curve, a simple, iconic golden torch with a flame is positioned. The torch is a minimalist outline, with the flame depicted as a stylized, flickering shape. The golden lines of the wave continue to flow and undulate across the rest of the background, creating a sense of movement and continuity with the theme. The composition is clean, with ample negative space, and focuses the visual interest on the single, symbolic image of the torch within the wave. There is no text on this back cover, and the design is strategically placed to allow for a QR code to be placed in the bottom right corner without obstruction, maintaining a clean and sophisticated aesthetic.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card, minimalist style with clean lines and simple shapes. The background is a deep, textured navy blue, reminiscent of a starry night sky. Scattered across the canvas are small, subtle white dots representing distant stars. Dominating the scene are three constellations rendered in thin, elegant gold lines with glowing star points. The topmost constellation depicts a stylized sea turtle, its outline formed by interconnected golden lines and a few brighter stars marking key points. A single golden line with a star connects the turtle to the upper left edge. Below and slightly to the right of the turtle, a second constellation forms a delicate heart shape, also outlined in gold with a prominent star at its apex and another star to its left, connected by a golden line. Further down and to the right, the third constellation creates the simple, clean outline of an apple with a stem and a leaf, again defined by thin gold lines and a few sparkling star points, with a connecting golden line extending to the lower right. The overall impression is serene, magical, and sophisticated, evoking a sense of dreams and cosmic connection. The composition is balanced with ample negative space.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with elegant, minimalist line art on a deep navy blue background. The primary decorative element is a single, delicate golden line art drawing of a hibiscus flower positioned in the upper right quadrant, its stem curving gracefully down and to the left, framing the text. The message, "Mele Sing your true song Travel with your heart Trust your heart," is rendered in a flowing, handwritten cursive script in the same golden hue. The text is centered and clearly legible, with ample white space around it. Small, subtle golden dots and starbursts are scattered sparingly throughout the background, adding a touch of celestial magic without overwhelming the design. The overall aesthetic is sophisticated, heartfelt, and serene.
